changes.change: Add support for A7-A11 because im dumb and forgot to compile for arm64.
Allow toggling of components, and preference panel restyling to accompany it. Implemented toggling of notification themeing.
Theme stacked notifications, fix folder opening glitch, fix notification theming not changing on settings change, fix notification close buttons not styling, fix 3D Touch text.
Fix 3D Touch crash and theme notification long look header.
